Description.Name: Lounge
Description.Details: A shared social space outside the barracks allows the crew to bond as a team. We can get some tables and couches and even some table games to improve eye hand cordination. The Lounge adds +1 to Crew Morale.

AssignedCastDescription: I've just had to chase another card game out of the mess hall so the staff could clean up, Commander. The crew needs somewhere to relax that isn't also where we're trying to serve meals.
